Summary: Object flew from sw variably to the ne. Slowing, abrupt change in movements left/right. slowed, sped up. dropped in elev.
divs: Sighting DetailsKids were in the backyard looking at stars. Came in told me to come look. It is very dark in our backyard at night. If you look at Venus right now it is huge and in the west. This light was four times as big as Venus. It seemed to be as close as an airplane in its path. The object moved in quick movements and then slowed. Made small movements in different directions. It almost looked like a someone learning to drive because of the sudden changes. The object went from the south over Denair to the east a bit and then north to about Hickman and then off eastward. I have seen my share of strange here in the valley of California. This may just have been something new from area 51. Who knows. If it was, whatever it is, has some skills.
